_comment: Example configuration for Continuous Data Generation
_description: This shows all available configuration options
_duration_options: Number of days or 'indefinite' for continuous running
_initial_projects_desc: Number of projects to create when starting
_burst_factor_desc: 0.0 = very bursty (concentrated at 9am, 1pm, 4pm), 1.0 = steady throughout day
_comment_frequency_desc: Average comments per task per day (0.5 = 1 comment every 2 days)
_task_completion_rate_desc: Percentage of tasks completed per week
_blocked_task_frequency_desc: Percentage of tasks that become blocked
